title: noDuplicateJsxProps
description: |
  Prevents JSX properties to be assigned multiple times.
---
import { Tabs, TabItem } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

<Tabs>
<TabItem label="JSX and TSX" icon="seti:javascript">
**Since**: `v1.0.0`
:::note
- Diagnostic Category: [`lint/suspicious/noDuplicateJsxProps`](/reference/diagnostics#diagnostic-category)
- This rule is **recommended**. A [diagnostic error](/reference/diagnostics#error) will appear when linting your code.
:::

Sources: 
- Same as: <a href="https://github.com/jsx-eslint/eslint-plugin-react/blob/master/docs/rules/jsx-no-duplicate-props.md" target="_blank"><code>react/jsx-no-duplicate-props</code></a>

## Description
Prevents JSX properties to be assigned multiple times.

## Examples

### Invalid

```jsx
<Hello name="John" name="John" />
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.jsx:1:8 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/no-duplicate-jsx-props">lint/suspicious/noDuplicateJsxProps</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">✖</span></strong> <span style="color: Tomato;">This JSX property is assigned multiple times.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>&lt;Hello name=&quot;John&quot;
```jsx
<label xml:lang="en-US" xml:lang="en-US"></label>
```

### Valid

```jsx
<Hello firstname="John" lastname="Doe" />
```

```jsx
<label xml:lang="en-US" lang="en-US"></label>
```

## How to configure
```json title="biome.json"
{
	"linter": {
		"rules": {
			"suspicious": {
				"noDuplicateJsxProps": "error"
			}
		}
	}
}

```
